english: I'll take Turgut.
They cannot pass through that castle.
I'm sorry.
He is so stubborn.
A lock that will open every door.

text: Her duvarı aşacak bir yiğit vardır Deli Demir.
english: There is a brave man who can overcome any obstacle, Deli Demir.

text: Eğer Turgut'u alamazsak da uğruna can veririz.
english: If we cannot get Turgut, we will kill him.

text: Kara Toygar geldi ezdi. Elaziz de yıkıp geçti. Aşıtı keferesi de ayrı bir dert. Biz neredeyiz beyim? Moğol peşimizdeyken sürüm daha besiliydi. Sayısı daha çoktu. Şimdi elimizde kola kola eti kemiğe yapışmış kırk büyük başkalarımız...
english: Karatoygar came and crushed it. And El Aziz destroyed it. We've been through this. Where are we, sir? When we were in the Mongolian pursuit, the herd was more fertile. There were more of them. Now we have 40 big head sheep with meat and meat stuck to them.

text: Niye? Celallenip kafa tutmadığımız kimse kalmadı da ondan beyim.
english: Karatoygar came and crushed it. And El Aziz destroyed it. We've been through this. Where are we, sir? When we were in the Mongolian pursuit, the herd was more fertile. There were more of them. Now we have 40 big head sheep with meat and meat stuck to them.

text: Bize yazık değil mi? Çoluk çocuğumuzun rızkını kurde kuşa yemettik.
english: Aren't we sorry? We didn't feed our children to the wolves.
If he goes like this...
I'm afraid our sons won't see the light of day.
That is true, my Bey. You are right, my Bey.
So what will we do Kurdoglu?
What is the solution?
He will save us from this trouble.

text: Tecrübeye sahip biz seni tanırız bu obada.
english: We know you from this tribe.
Blackbeard.

text: Her zaman yiğit, her zaman açık sözlüydünüz.
english: You were always brave and open-minded.
You are still like that. Thank you.
I knew I could trust you.
The solution is to go to Suleyman Shah...
The Bey should be in Gundogdu.
...will be busy with our tribe's affairs.
The sale of our animals...
The sale of our goods in other cities...

text: ...bin türlü eşkıya ile mücadele edilmesini gerektiren zor bir görev.
english: ...and the struggle of a thousand kinds of hostages.

text: Yeni yurdumuzda bize pek rahat vermeyecekler.
english: They will not give us much comfort in our new homeland.
Ertugrul...

text: Obamızı haçlardan gelecek saldırılara karşı korumak için...
english: I am here to protect our tribe from the attacks of the Crusaders...
with his Alps.
With God's permission...
Tomorrow, he will take Turgut with him.
If God permits, my Bey.
If God permits.
If you think Suleyman Shah is suitable...

text: Ben devletine ihanet eden babamın değil.
english: I am not the father of the traitor to his state.
I want to be the daughter of this tribe.

text: Soyumdan bildiğim yiğit insanların yanında kocamak.
english: I know a lot of brave men from my family.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imizle Gökçe'nin düğününe katılmanız hepimizi çok mutlu edecektir.
english: You and Ertugrul Bey will make us all very happy to attend Gokce's wedding.
Good luck.
Sir, they sent this from Aleppo.
He left the earring and went away. It was Sahabeddin's gift.
I can't stand it.
Toss Hartmut.
How can this?
Who are you?
What is your name? What was your name? Kurdoglu.
I'm a man.
We can go and see the herd if you want.

text: İsterim elbette. Lakin önce iş yapacağım adamı tanımak isterim.
english: I would like to, of course. But first I want to know the man I will work for.
What do you want to know, Gundogdu?

text: Şu soysuz tapınakçı takımından olup olmadığını mesela.
english: ...about the Templar team.
You are a young man.

text: Bu lafından sonra daha da çok sevdim.
english: I liked her more after she said that.
Sit down.
Let's see who's the lucky one.
What did you talk about with Sarput?
I took the animals to the war camp. They liked the herd.

text: Biraz sıskan buldu ama ben bunlara illa ki bir alıcı bulurum dedi. İstediğim fiyatın da çok üstüne anlaştık.
english: He was a bit jealous, but he said he would find a buyer for them. We agreed on the price that I wanted.
The people will be very pleased.
...your reputation in the tribe will increase even more.

text: Adamın hayvanları satacağı yer bize ne ondan?
english: The place where he sells animals is none of our business.
After I give him the money...

text: İsterse denize döküp balıklara yem yapar. Ama...
english: He can even throw it into the sea and feed the fish.

text: Adam hayvanları Antakya'ya götürecek. Haçlı konutluğuna. Müşterileri oradaymış. Ne vardır bunda Gündoğdu?
english: He will take the animals to Antakya, to the pilgrimage home. His customers are there. What is it, Gundogdu?

text: Ya babamı bilmez gibi konuşma Selcan.
english: Don't talk as if you don't know my father, Selcan.

text: İhtiyarı ikna edersen Gündoğdu obaya refah gelir.
english: If you convince the old man, Gundogdu, the tribe will be at peace.
If there is prosperity, there is peace.

text: Her kim ki bu huzursuz obaya huzur getirir...
english: Whoever brings peace to this restless tribe...
The Beydom is his right.
Send Turgut Alp.

text: Alp'in ellerini biz gittikten sonra çözersin.
english: You can solve it after we go.
See you again.
I'll pull the rope.
Do you want to kill me?
that you are my brother.
I will kill you!
You bastards!
Look, guys!

text: Allah'a şükürler olsun Turgut kardeş yaşıyor.
english: Thank God, brother Turgut is alive.
We need to take them to the hospital.
Ertugrul is seriously injured.
He won't get in the way.
There must be a reason for this.

text: Tünel yerinde kan vardır. Lakin yarası yoktur.
english: There is blood everywhere. But there is no wound.
Look!
I'm gonna eat all of that

text: Alacağım beyim. Ciğerlerini söküm akbabalara. Yedir ücüğü beyim. Kafam kaybetmiş şunu çıkar. Çıkar şunu.
english: I will take your life, sir. I will make your father suffer, sir. Take this out.

text: Soysuzlar nereden vurdun seni? Kardeşim yaranı bulamıyorum.
english: Where did the robbers shoot you? I can't find my brother.

text: Allah'ım bana akıl fikir ver. Nerede bu hainler?
english: God, give me a good idea. Where are these traitors?
Let me up.
Peace be upon you. Peace be upon you, too.

text: Biz, Ali Selçuklu Devleti hükümdarı Alaaddin Keykubad'ın elçisiyiz.
english: We are the governor of the Seljuk state, Alaaddin Keykubat's envoys.

text: Beyiniz Süleyman Şah ile görüşmek isteriz.
english: We would like to meet your Bey, Suleyman Shah.
You brought good news.
Let's inform Suleyman Shah.
You should hold your knees tighter. Or you'll fall.

text: ...besenlerin de tam çıkmasını istiyorsan boyunu katı tut.
english: If you want your patterns to be perfect, fold it.

text: Böyle güler yüzle devam et. Yarın tepene çıkarlar.
english: Keep smiling like this. They'll be on top of the mountain tomorrow.

text: Gökçe bacıya itaatte kusur etmiyorsun değil mi Selcan?
english: You're not afraid of Gokce, are you, Selcanik?
Go on, Kurdoglu.

text: Kaç alpiyle sürü için müşteri bakmaya gitti. Emin misin?
english: He went to check on the customers for the ride with his men. Are you sure?
They were from Tato Serput.

text: İnşallah arkamızdan gizli bir iş çevirmiyordur.
english: I hope he is not doing anything behind our backs.
I hope they are not. Who are they?
Commander of the Belçük tribe, Ersugun Bey.

text: Buralara kadar geldiyse fırtına çok yakındır.
english: If he comes this far, he is very close to the storm.

text: Babası öldü, kardeşi hâlâ başımıza bela.
english: His father is dead and his brother is still in trouble.
Where will this end?

text: Onun yüzünden bir bela daha gelirse başımıza. İvaya yaptığını mı yaparsın?
english: If something bad happens to us because of him... Will you do what you did to Yigal?

text: Halime o kadın kadar kolay geberemez Kurdoğlu.
english: Halime cannot die as easily as that woman, Kurdoglu.

text: Osman Alaaddin Keykubad'ın elçisi. Sizi görüşmek ister. Hemen al içeri.
english: I am the ambassador of Sultan Aladdin Keykubad. I would like to see you.
Süleyman Şah is waiting for you.
Welcome, brother. You brought us good news.

text: Eyvallah Süleyman Şah'ım. Nasipte yeniden görüşmekle varmış. Çok şükür.
english: Thank you, Suleyman Shah. I am glad to see you again. Thank you.
Come here, brother.

text: Bayı'da seni de iyi gördüm Süleyman Şah'ım.
english: I saw you well in the year of the tribe, Suleyman Shah.

text: Başımızdan türlü belalar savuşturduk. Çok şükür. Hepsini bilirim.
english: We have been through a lot. Thank God. I know all of it.

text: Bu belalardan biri de şehzadelerden gelmiş Süleyman Şah'ım.
english: One of these troubles came from the Shahzadas, Suleyman Shah.

text: Kara Toygarlı olan meseleyi iyi biliriz.
english: We know the issue of Kara Toygar well.

text: Kara Toygar çok can yaktı Ersegun.
english: Kara Toygar has done a great job.

text: İnşallah Sultan Alaaddin küçük şehzade içinde başımıza yeni bir Kara Toygar belası göndermez. Vay vay vay. Cenk meydanlarının aslanı Kurdoğul.
english: I hope Sultan Aladdin does not send us a new trouble......for the little Shahzada. Wow! The lion of the battlefield is Kurdoglu.
You speak as sharp as a knife.
This matter is closed for our Sultan.

text: Hele ki Ertuğrul Bey'in Halep'te yaptıklarını öğrendikten sonra.
english: Especially after Ertugrul Bey learned what he was doing in Aleppo.

text: Ertuğrul Bey İslam âlemini büyük bir savaşın eşiğinden çevirdi.
english: Ertugrul Bey turned the Islamic world from the threshold of a great war.

text: Konya'da herkes Ertuğrul Bey'in kahramanlıklarından bahseder.
english: Does everyone in Konya talk about Ertugrul Bey's heroism?

text: Sultan Alaaddin seni buraya boşu boşuna yollamaz.
english: Sultan Aladdin would not send you here for nothing.
I hope so.
The state is the secret, Kurdoglu.

text: Süleyman Şah'tan gayrısına söyleyemem. Kendisi uygun görürse o ayrı.
english: I cannot tell anyone other than Suleyman Shah. If he thinks he is right, he is wrong.
If you excuse us, Kurdoglu.

text: Erdoğul'undan destursuz süt bile sağlama Süleyman.
english: You are not even allowed to give milk to your son, Suleyman.
I will make you see that.

text: Nedir bu kadar mühim olan mesele?
english: What is this important matter?
Suleyman Shah.
The Islamic world is facing difficult times.

text: Moğol eşkıyasının azgın nefesi Anadolu'da can yakar oldu.
english: The Mongolian massacre was a great success in Anatolia.
We must stop this monster.

text: Aksi takdirde taş üstünde taş, baş üstünde baş kalmayacak.
english: Otherwise, you will be dead.
...the Mongols' tyranny...
No one knows better than us.
Our unity, our unity...
...and the corruption...
The Mongolian tribe has made us suffer.

text: Sultan Alaaddin de bu yüzden ittifak arar. Nasıl?
english: That is why Sultan Aladdin is looking for an alliance. How?
A alliance with the Ayyubids, Suleyman Shah.

text: Çok şükür bu günleri de gördük.
english: Thank God, we saw them today.
That's what we needed, Ersagun Bey.
Unity and unity.

text: Sultan Alaaddin'i bu yolu açan senin genç oğlum Ertuğrul Bey oldu Süleyman Şah. Bu yüzden hem sana hem de oğluna özel olarak saygılarını gönderdim.
english: Your young son Ertugrul Bey, who opened the way for Sultan Aladdin, Suleyman Shah. That's why I sent my special regards to you and your son.
If you accept, I will send you gifts.
Enough.
Soldiers, bring him in.

text: Bütün aletiniz sağ olsun, var olsun.
english: May God bless you.

text: Bu ittifakın mührü de bir evlilik olacak Süleyman Şah'ım.
english: The seal of this alliance will be a marriage, Suleyman Shah.

text: Sultan Alaaddin Şam Melikesi Adilliye ile evlenmek ister.
english: Sultan Aladdin wants to marry the Queen of Damascus, Adilya.

text: Bu çok isabetli bir siyaset olmuş Erzak Bey.
english: This is a very good policy, Erzak.

text: Sultan Alaaddin kız istemek için beni vazifelendirdi.
english: Sultan Aladdin appointed me to ask for a daughter.

text: Düğün için götürülen kervan Halep'te bekler.
english: The caravan for the wedding is waiting in Aleppo.
What does the Sultan want from us?

text: Sultanımız kervanın kurulması için Ertuğrul Bey ve alplerinden destek ister.
english: He asks for support from Ertugrul Bey and his Alps......to establish our Sultan's caravan.

text: Sonra da seninle ve oğlunla bir araya gelip yemek yiyip istişare etmek.
english: Then, you and your son will come together, eat and consult.

text: Sultanın ricasından da davetinden de şeref duydum.
english: I heard about the Sultan's request and his invitation.
Ertugrul is on the way.

text: Girince kervana destek olması için sizinle yollarım.
english: I will send you to the caravan when it comes.
Thank you, Suleyman Shah.
There is one more matter.
...Halime Sultan and Shahzada Yigit.

text: İstihbaratımız onların obanızda olduğunu haber etti.
english: Our intelligence has informed us that they are in your tribe.

text: Otağı yine Fırat'ın suyu gibi köpürdü Selcan Hatun.
english: The tent is as high as the water of the Fırat, Selcan Hatun.
You must learn what is what.

text: Koskoca Selçuklu sultanı otağa elçi gönderip, deve sırrı paylaşmışsa...
english: If he sent an envoy to the Seljuk Sultan and shared the secret...

text: Bu iyi haber değildir Kurdoğlu. Elbette değildir. Ertuğrul Selçuklu için de Halep için de bir kahramandır artık.
english: This is not good news, Kurdoglu. Of course it is not. Ertugrul is a hero for both the Seljuk and Aleppo.
The caravan at the door is a gift caravan.

text: Ertuğrul'la babası nedir o cömert hediyeler?
english: They say that the father of Ertugrul is Ojo Merte.

text: Ben obanın beylerini Gündoğdu'nun beyliği için hazır ederken sen de evine sahip çık.
english: While I prepare the Beys of the tribe for Gundogdu's Beydom......you take care of your own.
...and unite with his father.
Don't worry.

text: Süleyman Şah'ın Ertuğrul'u kurtuğu her oyunu bozacağım.
english: I will destroy Suleyman Shah's plan with Ertugrul.
Good.

text: Babam gibi benim de peşime düşecekler.
english: They'll come after me like my father.

text: Ya öldürmek için ya da kullanmak için.
english: Either to kill or to use.
Our father doesn't even have a grave.

text: Başına varıp bir Fatiha bile okuyamayız.
english: We can't even pray a Fatiha for him.

text: Benim sonum ondan farklı mı olacak sanırsın abla?
english: Do you think my fate will be different from hers?

text: Ertuğrul Bey seni her türlü kötülükten korur yiğidim. Endişelenme böyle.
english: Ertugrul Bey will protect you from all kinds of evil, my brave one. Don't worry.

text: Ölmüşüm ya da ölmemişim umurunda bile değil.
english: I don't care if I'm dead or not.

text: Benim yüzümden daha fazla acı çekmene izin vermeyeceğim abla.
english: I won't let you have more than this.
Enough.
I haven't seen the sunset since I was born.

text: Ablam oldun, anam oldun, dert ortağım oldun. Bunca kahır çektin.
english: You became my sister, mother, partner in trouble. You suffered a lot.
Not anymore, sister.
Be happy.

text: Bırak da gideyim. Ertuğrul abimle senin aranda irinli bir yara gibi yaşayamam.
english: Let me go. I cannot live like a beast with my brother Ertugrul.
What are you saying, Yigit?

text: İkinizin de acıyı çekmesine izin vermeyeceğim abla.
english: I will not let you both suffer.
Welcome, Halime Sultan.
Thank you, sister Gokce.
I am sorry for my father.
May God rest his soul.
But, brother...
That's not a big deal.

text: Başımıza açılacak yeni belalardan endişe ederiz.
english: We are worried about the new troubles that will arise.
The next one is the right one.
I hope he is not a informer of the new trouble.

text: Süleyman Şah sizi otağa da bekler Halime Sultan. Kuşu an kafesi hazırla.
english: Suleyman Shah is waiting for you in the tent, Halime Sultan. Prepare the cage.
The Seljuks are after me.
There won't be any more here.
They will leave Ertugrul Agha Bey alone.
You have a way to hell.

text: ...ben de bir gün bir gün bir gün...
english: I'm going to go to the bathroom.
I brought you the greetings of Sultan Aladdin.

text: Sultanımız sizin ve kardeşinizin sağlığından endişe eder.
english: Our Sultan is worried about you and your brother's health.

text: Sultan ne vakit bizim sağlığımızdan endişe duysa...
english: When the Sultan is worried about our health...
...we will be in trouble.

text: Asil bir Selçuklu melikesi olduğunuz için sizi sever ve sayar Halime Sultan.
english: Since you are a true Seljuk queen, Halime Sultan loves and respects you.
That is why I am here...

text: Kayseri'de, Erciyes'in eteklerinde bir konak hazırlattı. Mahiyetiniz olacak. Şehzademizin eğitimiyle yakinen ilgilenecektir.
english: He has a mansion in Kayseri, in Erciyes. You will have a good time there. He will be interested in the Prince's education.

text: ...sizin de bir Emir'le evlenip mutlu bir hayat sürmenizi diler.
english: I wish you a happy marriage and a happy life.
If you think it is appropriate.
I will think of your offer for my brother.
When it comes to me...

text: Kendime de gönlüme de çizdiğim yol başka.
english: The path I have set for myself and my heart is different.

text: Süleyman Şah'ım da uygun görürse ömrümün geri kalanını bu ablanın kızı olarak geçirmek isterim.
english: If Suleyman Shah sees fit, I would like to spend the rest of my life as the daughter of this tribe.
I offer my regards to my uncle Sultan Aladdin.
If you'll excuse me.
It is really strange that he wants to stay in your tribe.
He should be aware of the values ​​offended to him.

text: Sen adın gibi yiğit bir çocuksun evlat.
english: You are a brave boy, son.

text: Hele Dündar bir ayaklansın. İkiniz beraber inşallah alp olacaksınız.
english: I hope Dundar gets well soon and you both become Alps together.
When that time comes...
I will do your sword with my own hands.
Don't upset your sister, okay?
If she is the daughter of that tribe,

text: Sen de artık bu obanın yiğidisin.
english: You are the brave man of this tribe.
Need him?
What does Sultan Aladdin want from us?
Don't worry.
Sultan Aladdin is no longer our enemy.

text: Ya Yiğit gördün mü? Artık o dert de bitti ha.
english: See, Yigit? That's the end of the story.
After I pay my father?
I should be more to blame.
Go get him.
Come on, hurry up!
I'm sorry, mother Hayme.
I'm sorry.

text: Ne oldu? Turgut nerede? O hainin adını bu obada bir daha ağzına alan olursa......dilini koparırım bunu böyle bilesin.
english: What happened? Where is Turgut? If anyone ever speaks of that traitor again in this tribe......I will cut off your tongue.

text: Ne dersin sen Bamsı? Ağzından çıkanı kulağın işitir mi senin?
english: What are you talking about, Bamsi? Can you hear what you're saying?

text: Bizi bu hale koyan haçlı değildir Aykız.
english: The one who put us in this situation is not the pilgrim, Aykiz.
He is not a man to be despised.
betrayed us.

text: Yalan söylüyorsun. Yalan söylüyorsun, Turgut yapmaz bunu. Yalan!
english: You're lying. You're lying. Turgut wouldn't do this. You're lying.
May you suffer.
I
Help, O Shafi, help.

text: Gündoğdu için ne vakit ümitlensem beni sükutu hayale uğrattı.
english: Whenever I was worried about Gundogdu, he made me dream of Sukyot.
He took your brother from me.

text: Abdurrahman Ertuğrul'dan haber getirdiğini de anlamalıydım.
english: I should have known when Abdurrahman informed me about Ertugrul.
He was going to die.
He's here.
Don't you worry.

text: Vakti gelince onun da hesabı görür.
english: When the time comes, you will see his end.
...for the sake of my father.
Please, Halime Sultan.
I knew you knew them.
They were like the fingers of a lion.

text: Sizin için de bir iş var da bana kurbanın olayım.
english: I have a job to do.
I don't know, Aykiz.
But that castle is like hell.

text: Ölmek için her gün dua edersin.
english: You pray every day to die.
God, forgive me.
Do not leave me alone, God.

text: Tut dilidir doğrasalar Ertuğrul Bey'e bunu etmezdi.
english: If they had cut the head of the madman, Ertugrul Bey would not have done this.
What am I going to do now?
Oh.
Hello.
Oh.
Oh.
Cry, my dear sister.
This is our fate.

text: Abla ben yıllardır onun yanında bile onu hasrettim. Ah benim güzel bacım.
english: Sister, I have been longing for him for years. My beautiful sister.
I finally found him.
Someone has been found.

text: Şimdi de Azra'yla olmak ister olayım.
english: Now he wants to be with Azra, sister.

text: Çıkmadıkçandan umut kesilmez. Harap etme kendini.
english: You can't stop hoping. Don't ruin yourself.
If Felek takes him from me...
I am so sorry.
I regret it, sister.
Okay.

text: Babamdan sonra bu hayat dolumunu da kaybedersem he?
english: What if I lose my father and my life?
Every breath is death to me.
Stop being so angry, Gokce.
Gundogdu saved brother.
Now, Arabi is looking for a cure.

text: Bize dua etmekten gayrı çare yoktur Gökçen.
english: We have no choice but to pray, Gokce.
I cannot breathe without him.
I'm going to go to the other side.
Don't worry, they are in your hands.
Don't leave any traces, Mohamed.
You are not only their child.
You are the mother of the tribe.
If you get killed...

text: Ben gencecik alplerime nasıl ölmeyi emrederim?
english: How can I order my young Alps to die?
My heart is as big as an egg.
...my Bey.
I will wait there.
How will we look at him?
If he is surprised...
How can we stay in this abode?
If what they say is true...

text: ...Turgut'un başını obana meydana asmak benim boynumun borcudur.
english: It is my duty to take Turgut's head and to take the tribe's place.
I am sorry.
I'm sorry.
We will stand and wait.
Do you understand, my daughter?
Let me see.
Did Turgut do this?
Sissy.

text: Ormanda bulup getirdiği gün geldi aklıma.
english: I remembered the day he found it in the forest.
The dog he caught.
She's a good girl.
and your destruction.
I have been shouting at you like my own children.

text: Sen bize anasızlık acısı yaşatma Naime Ana.
english: Don't make us suffer, Mother.

text: Kardinal olan bir dostum bana şöyle demişti Petruccio.
english: A friend of mine who is a cardinal told me this, Petruccio.
perform it.
is the God that the Templars worship.
They're my friends.

text: Karabüyü ve her türlü kötülük onlardan geliyor.
english: ...and all kinds of evil.

text: Sabah cadılarının satirik keçileri onlara yol gösterir.
english: The satirical goats of the Sabah witches will guide them.
Those who cannot come to us with their power of action...

text: Bu türlü iftilalarla bizi yıkamazlar Thomas.
english: They cannot destroy us with such slanders, Thomas.

text: ...sizi bileğinin gücüyle yenen bir kişi tanıdım.
english: I met a man who defeated you with his wrist power.
That's Ertugrul.
As long as Ertugrul is alive...

text: Tapınağınızın gözümde zerrece bir değeri olmayacak sevgili dostum Petrucci.
english: will be of no use to your temple, my dear friend Petruchio.
The Holy One?
Are you okay?
I had better days, Eftelyan.
You must read the report that the devil wrote to the Pope, Aftalia.

text: Hakkınızda kötü bir şey yazdıysa ne yapacağız efendim?
english: What if he wrote something bad about us?
The Templar Knights will be defeated by the Templars...
It is better to kill him.
As you command.
Those so-called nomads...
How could Turgut Alp have taken them?

text: Bunlar gördüğümüz en sinsi düşman beyim.
english: They are my most senseless enemies.
They won't be able to fight.

text: Ya bu saat mi onun peşine düşerler?
english: What if they chase him?
Or you can change your clothes...
to the trap.

text: Laf çok da çare nedir beyim?
english: There are many words, what is the solution?

text: Daha ne kadar şehit verip arkasından gözyaşını dökeceğiz?
english: We will not give him a martyr and tear his eyes off.

text: Bu kaleden yayılan fitne fücur belasını...
english: I will destroy the evil spirit...
We need to cut it.
Our tribe...

text: Hatta Eyyubi sınırının ötesinde bile olsa...
english: Even if it is beyond the borders of the Ayyubid period,
...the evil...
He is being attacked by the tribe. He must be killed.
Oh, no.

text: Kalelerini başlarına geçirmeliyiz. Hal çaresi bu mudur beyim? Kılıcı kuşanıp dağlara yaslanarak mı geçireceğiz bütün ömrümüzü?
english: We should build their castles. Is this the solution, my Bey? Should we spend our lives on the mountains with swords?

text: Onlar sinsi, biz cengaver. Onlar kazanan, bizse kaybeden mi olacağız? Başka bir yol olmalı. Başka bir yol olmalı.
english: They are the Sinsi, we are the Cengaver. We will be the winners, if we lose. There must be another way.
People are not always ready for war, my Bey.
We are the Alps of the Ermeydan, my Bey.
We can't make the castle fall.

text: Buna uygun ne teçhizatımız vardır ne de talimimiz.
english: We have neither the equipment nor the training to do this.

text: Öfkeye kapılıp hata etmek olmaz beyim. Karabudak doğru söyler baba.
english: You can't get angry and make mistakes, my Bey. Black-nosed is right, father.
We cannot destroy that castle.
But we can hit them with our own moves.
How will it be, Gundogdu?
It is so humiliating.

text: Onlar kadar sinsi olmayı nasıl becereceğiz?
english: How can we manage to be as stupid as them?
His body is as strong as his heart.
I'm so sorry for your loss, Ertugrul Bey.
and you shouldn't be ashamed.
A little courage.
A little intelligence is enough.
Of course, Iman.
If one of these is missing...
So, he left the tribe.
Thank God, we have complete faith, my Bey.
our hearts and our wrists are alive.

text: Beylik vasıfları taşıyan Gündoğdu'nun zekasına itibar ederiz.
english: We will follow the intelligence of Gundogdu, who has the title of Bey.
Let us listen to it so that our minds are clear.
Thank you, uncle.
I say...
These Templars...
from the mountain of Sarp.

text: Yoksa onların kalelerinin kapısını dahi oynatamayız.
english: Otherwise, we cannot even open their gates.
These Templars are everywhere.
If we do not destroy their castles...
If we do not dry that swamp...
We killed all the flies. What can we do?
Let me look.
with the Seljuk
We must form an alliance with Ayyubids.
If we form an alliance...

text: Onların yardımı sayesinde o kaleyi başlarına yıkarız.
english: We will destroy that castle with their help.

text: İşte o vakit yaptığımız bu saldırı bir zafere dönüşür.
english: Then, this attack will be a victory.
Gundogdu Bey is right, my Bey.
Mind is above all, sir.

text: Hey maşallah, doğru der aslan parçası.
english: Yes, he is right, my dear.

text: Kurdoğlu yine her zamanki gibi haklı çıktı.
english: Kurdoglu is right again.
Go on, kids.

text: Bize Halep'i dillendiren Gündoğdu yine derdimizin dermanı oldu.
english: Gundogdu who made us speak of Aleppo was the cure for our troubles.
He showed us the way with his intelligence and heroism.
Thank you, Karabul.
with his own hands.
Ertugrul...
He was still breathing.

text: Nefes aldıkça bize de huzur yok.
english: We are not at peace as long as we breathe.

text: Kurdoğulundan neler olduğunu öğreneceğim. Sabah konuşuruz olan biter.
english: I will learn what is going on in Kurdoglu. We will talk in the morning.
I was wondering about you.
Did you do your job?
I was sleeping in the middle of the night.
It won't end.

text: Eğer bu ilacı bu kadar fazla içersen, gözün açıkken kabuslar görmeye başlayacaksın.
english: If you take this medicine too much, you will start seeing nightmares.
Then you'll experience the worst of deaths.
For a lady like you.
If you'll excuse me, I'd like to ask you...

text: Alaaddin'in çeyiz kervanına ben refakat etmek isterim.
english: I want to accompany Alaeddin's caravan.

text: Bir taşla iki kuş vurmak niyetindeyim.
english: I intend to shoot two birds with one stone.
We will win Sultan Aladdin's trust.
But the most important thing is the Templars.
The temple people

text: Bu izdivaca mani olmak isteyeceği gün gibi aşikâr. Kervana pusu kuracaklardır.
english: They will set a trap for the caravan.
So? So, I mean...
Those who go hunting are hunted, father.

text: Hem bu tapınakçılara haddini bildirmek hem de boyumuzun itibarını yüceltmek için çok iyi bir fırsat.
english: It is a great opportunity to inform the Templars and to enhance our reputation.

text: Bu sebepten izin verirsen kervana ben eşlik etmek isterim.
english: If you allow me, I would like to accompany the caravan.
May God help you.
You're tired.
I'll wait for you at the gate.
Don't leave Dundar alone.
My dear Mishkun.

text: Senin de boy boyun çocukların olduğunu anlayacaksın.
english: You will understand that you are a child of the Borg.
...and step on their feet.
your heart will turn into a fire.
I'm going to bed.
Do not leave me alone, Ertugrul.

text: Başkasının kadın olmaktan sönmeye razı olduğum gün......beni hayata bağlayan bu sözlerin oldu.
english: The day I decided to die instead of being a woman......these words came to my mind.
I didn't give in.
You should not give up.
Give it to me, Ertugrul.

text: Sen nefes aldığın sürece ben senden vazgeçmeyeceğim.
english: I won't give up on you until you breathe.

text: Demek benden Sultan Alaaddin ile Şam Melikesinin nikahını gizliyorlardı.
english: So, they were hiding the wedding of Sultan Aladdin and the Queen of Damascus.

text: Çiğiz kervanı Konya'dan yola çıkmadan biliyorduk.
english: We knew about the Chiesa caravan before we left Konya.

text: Bu evlilik bizim çıkarlarımıza uygun düşmez Kurdoğdu.
english: This marriage is not suitable for our interests, Kurdoglu.
...and your profits.
That caravan will not go to ask for Melike.
I will not give you anything.
We know the German's every move.
The Sultan asked for help from the Kayis.
Harsanyi

text: Ama canımı sıkan biri var. Ertuğrul.
english: But there is someone who is bothering me. Ertugrul.
He can't take that caravan. He's a heavy wound.

text: Bu yarayla yaşaması bile bir mucize.
english: It's a miracle that he's alive.

text: Turgut Alp gördüğüm en sağlam deliği açmış Ertuğrul'un bu uğursuz bedeninde.
english: Durgut Alp has opened the most solid hole I've ever seen in Ertugrul's......ill-fated body.
God doesn't kill those who don't kill.
Whoever goes, goes.
He will die with the ambassador.
Caravan is our business.

text: Sen obadaki gücünü pekiştir. Gerisini biz hallederiz.
english: You strengthen your strength in the tribe. We will take care of the rest.
While Ertugrul was in this state...

text: Süleyman Şah'ı devirmek için bundan iyi bir fırsat olmaz. Benim de tahammülüm kalmadı Ertugrul.
english: There is no better chance to overthrow Suleyman Shah. I cannot tolerate it, Ertugrul.
He's been working against me every day.

text: Er ya da geç seninle iş birliği yaptığım ortaya çıkacaktır.
english: Sooner or later, I will cooperate with you.

text: Aynı şeyleri düşündüğümüzü bilmek beni rahatlattı.
english: Knowing that we think the same thing made me feel better.

text: Ama önce bana iki kişiyi teslim edeceksin.
english: But first, you will hand over two men to me.
Ibn Arabi and the little Shahzada.

text: İbn-i Nur ağabey yarın yola çıkacak.
english: Brother Ibn Nur will set off tomorrow.
There will be no one but the dervish with you.
When he came to the little prince...
Don't worry.
Who will come to you brave with their feet?

text: Bilirim, bu obada en fazla bana güvenirsin. Ama babanın verdiği vazifeyi bana bile deme. Selcan, sen ne dersin? Çadırda bizden başka hiç kimse yok. Yerin kulağı vardır. Allah'ım korusun seni.
english: I know you trust me the most in this tribe. But don't even tell me about the duty your father gave you. Selcan, what are you saying? There is no one else in the tent but us. You have ears tomorrow. May God protect you.

text: Koskoca Sultan Alaeddin obaya elçi gönderip babandan rica ettiyse ona hayır demek olmaz tabi.
english: If Sultan Aladdin sent an envoy to the tribe......and asked for your father's permission, he would not say no.

text: Lakin asıl önemli olan bu vazifeyi sana babanın vermesidir Gündoğdu'm. Her şeyin ne kadar değiştiğini sen de görürsün değil mi?
english: But what is really important is that your father gives you this duty, Gundogdu. You see how much everything has changed, don't you?
You fought the knights and defeated them.

text: Kardeşim ve alpleri kurtarıp obaya getirdin.
english: You saved my brother and the Alps and brought them to the tribe.

text: Süreyi için çok iyi bir alıcı buldun.
english: You found a good buyer for the time.

text: Sen obamıza güven ve altın getirdin. Bunların ne demek olduğunu bilirsin değil mi?
english: You brought us trust and gold. You know what these are, right?
For you, Hatun.

text: Allah izin verirse doğacak bebeğimiz için.
english: If God permits, for our baby.
But as I said...

text: Alplerin bile bilmesin nereye gideceğini, ne yapacağını.
english: Even the Alps don't know where they're going or what they're going to do.

text: Allah muhafaza, uğursuz kefenenin kulağına giderse......başına bir şey gelmesinden korkarım.
english: God forbid, if the evil geese hear this, I am afraid something bad will happen to him.
Yes, uncle.
Especially Kurdoglu, Gundogdu.

text: Küçük bir oyunla onu hain olup olmadığını anlamanda fayda var derim. Çünkü bu beylik yolunda en yakın müttefikin o olacaktır.
english: I say it's good for you to understand that he is a traitor......with a little trick. Because he will be your closest ally on this path of the Beydom.

text: ...eğri yola düşenin doğru yola çıktığı görünmemiştir.
english: It is not seen that the one who fell on the wrong path......has come on the right path.
What is on your mind?
I will tell my uncle about my mission.
I will say it wrong and wrong.
You will make sure he doesn't do anything wrong.
If my uncle is a traitor...

text: Bu haberi tapınakçılara uçurup bana pusa atacaktır.
english: He will spread this news to the Templars and shoot me.

text: İşte o vakit kanı bana helaldir.
english: Then, the blood is mine.
If not...
He was my biggest companion on the path of the Beydom.
...to the capital.
It's dangerous.

text: Seni buradan çıkartmanın bir yolunu buldum.
english: I found a way to get you out of here.
For the sake of the Shafi'i, may he rest in peace.
I hope she is well, my dear Halime.
Always keep your eyes on him.
If you hadn't left us alone.
Don't worry.

text: Bu yiğidin yanında nice koruyucular var.
english: ...and many guards with this yigit.

text: Gitmeden önce sana bir emanet bırakacağım.
english: I'll leave you a gift before I go..

text: Ben dönmeden Ertuğrul iyileşirse ona vereceksin.
english: If Ertugrul gets better before I come back, you'll give it to him.
Don't you dare look inside.
I will protect you at the cost of my life.
What did you think?
Only the Kayis can do this.

text: Böylelikle bu delikanlıyı da uyuşturucunun etkisinden kurtarabilirsin.
english: This way, you can save this boy from the effect of the drug.

text: Kayılarla birlikte mutlaka kaleye dönüp seni buradan çıkartacağım.
english: I will return to the castle with the Kayis and get you out of here.
My Sheikh, Ibn Arabi.
As they say in the tribe,
Tell her that I did my duty.
I pray every night.
May God help you.
Goodbye, father.
I'm not saying goodbye to you.
Because I will come back.
What will he do to Aykiz?
Obviously, the enemy saw us.

text: Ya o da yavuklusu olacak o hainin yanındaysa?
english: What if he's with that traitor?

text: Ya obadan haber getirip götüren onlarsa? Tüş! Tüş mü var la?
english: What if they bring news from the tribe? What?

text: Düne kadar sana Turgut Ertuğrul Bey'imizi hançerleyecek desem ne yapardın? Ümüğünü sıkar suyuna pilav pişirirdim. Ya gördün mü?
english: What would I do if I said that Turgut would be......hunting Ertugrul until yesterday? I would cook rice for him. Did you see?

text: Sahi, Aykız hainse bunu nasıl bilecek?
english: That's right. How can Aykiz know if he's a traitor?
We will keep Turgut.
Small clutches from my nail...

text: başından aşağı etinin her yerinden girip,
english: ...he would come from everywhere...
We will.
...and pull him out of his flesh...
...and we will do the blacksmithing.
...in front of Aykiz.
I'm going to eat.

text: Selcan bacının attığı kırbaç var ya...
english: You know the whip that Selcan threw?

text: O vakit o kırbaçları arayacak işte.
english: Then he will look for those swords.
What a nice whip I have.
He will say that he knows your value.
If you want him to forgive his sins, you must help me.
I'll do whatever I have to, my lady.
You must get me out of this castle.
You can't go back, ma'am.
I won't be alone when I get back.
Where were you going?
Kayi Oba.
To find Ertugrul Bey.
I'm sorry.

text: Alpler, destur var mıdır? Gel bacım.
english: Alps, may I come in? Come in, sister.

text: ...dünyaya geldiğim günden beri sevdim ben onu.
english: I loved him since the day I came to this world.
...that I loved and cared for.

text: Gönül verip sevdiğim Şah yiğidimdi o benim.
english: He was my beloved Shah Yigit.

text: Karşıda yatan kara dağları senden sonra ben ne ilerim dedim.
english: I said, what will I do after you?
I said, if I were a spring, I would be a grave.
If I were in the cold waters...
I said I wanted blood.
If you ride the horse of Shahbaz...
I said I wanted a coffin.
If I love a brave man after you...
I said, may God put me in a trap.

text: Benim canım sana kurban olsun Nedim.
english: I am sorry, Nedim.
If he did what you said...

text: Turgut'un canını almak bana helaldir bilirsiniz.
english: ...you know that it is my duty to save Turgut.

text: Eğer o soysuzun peşinden gider de beni götürmezseniz...
english: If you do not take me after that bastard...

text: Bilesiniz size de hakkımı helal etmem.
english: I will not give you my blessing.
in the castle of the Sultans.

text: ...su gibi bir şey veriyorlardı. Mavi mavi.
english: They were giving us something like water. Blue, blue.
They were torturing me.
There is something about this.
The path has been paved, Suleyman Shah.

text: Bunca işle uğraşmaktan sizi ağırlayamadım kusura bakmayın. Estağfurullah.
english: We couldn't help you with all this. I'm sorry. You're welcome.

text: Bir daha ne zaman görürüz sizi? Döneceğim.
english: When will we see you again? I'll be back.
Thank you, Jess.
God bless you.

text: Dualarınızı üzerimizden hiç eksik etmeyin. Dualarım hep sizinledir Süleyman Şah.
english: Don't let your prayers be absent. My prayers are always with you, Suleyman Shah.

text: Seçtiğim alpler analarıyla babalarıyla vedalatsın. Helallik istesin.
english: The Alps I chose will say goodbye to their parents.

text: Varsa evlatlarının kokusunu içine çeksin hazır olsun. Emrin olur beyim.
english: If there is any, let him smell his children and be ready. As you command, my Bey.
Is there any one who can escape from the prison?

text: Adımı koyanlar boşuna Kurdoğlu dememiştir Gündoğdu.
english: The ones who put my name on it didn't call me Kurdoglu.
Why is this preparation?

text: Yoksa tapınakçılardan Ertuğrul'u almaya gittiğini sakladığın gibi...
english: Or, as you hid from the Templars that you were going to take Ertugrul...
Are you going to hide this from me too?
I trust you, uncle.
First to my father, then to you.
What happened then?
What are you going to do with your Alps?
Aladdin.
His assistants will come.

text: Halep yakınlarındaki Büşra Tepesi'nden alıp Şam'a götüreceğim.
english: I will take them from the Bishra Hill near Aleppo and take them to Damascus.

text: Alaeddin, Şam emirinin yeğenine talipmiş. Onu isteyecekler.
english: Aladdin is after the nephew of the Emir of Damascus. They will ask for him.
Bye bye bye.
A great alliance, huh?
You will be in the middle of the fire again.

text: Bunu tapanakçılar duymuşsa işin çok zor evi.
english: If the Templars heard this, you would be in trouble.

text: Bu bilgiyi alplerinden bile saklamak da çok iyi.
english: It is good to hide this information from the Alps.
Until we find the traitor inside us...

text: Her işimizi gizli kapaklı yapmak zorundayız.
english: We have to do everything secretly.

text: Bana başka bir diyeceğin var mıdır?
english: Is there anything else you want to tell me?

text: Hayır duanı isterim emmi, başkanı olsun.
english: I want your blessing, my dear.
My prayers are always with you, Gundogdu.
Now go.

text: Düşa tepesine pusu kur. Ben Şam'a başka bir yoldan gideceğim.
english: Set up a camp at the top of the hill. I will go to Damascus from another way.
From the Templars.

text: Ya da Kurdoğlu'nun adamlarından gelen olursa tez kellesini vur.
english: Or if it comes from Kurdoglu's men, shoot him in the head.
As you command, sir.
Let's see.
Is my uncle a traitor? No.

text: İbnül Arabi'yi aldırmak için birlik göndermişsiniz efendim.
english: You sent a team to take Ibn Arabi, sir.

text: Senin de hemim bir vazifen var Titus.
english: You have an important job, Martitus.

text: Bir ihtiyarla bir dervişi ahmaya seni göndermek istemedim.
english: I didn't want to send you to a dervish with an old man.
Sultan Aladdin.
and get support from the Kayis

text: Şam emirinin yeğenini istemeye bir elçi gönderdi.
english: I sent a messenger to ask for the nephew of the Sham emir.
What a caravan!
and Gundogdu who accompanied them.
None of you will ever return, O Meletitus.
As you command, sir.
You're the best, Eftalyan.

text: Bu gece kardinalin hazırladığı raporu alacaksın.
english: You will be reported by the Cardinal tonight.
When you're sure you slept with the medicine...
We'll have to wait and see.
If he wrote about us wrong and false things...
He'll never wake up from his sleep.
Then you will go to Damascus.
If things go the other way...
I am here to protect you
You will do what is necessary.

text: selamı ve bereketi üzerinize olsun kardeşlerim.
english: May God bless you, brothers.
The chest you carry on it.

text: Hani şu içinde daha önce hiçbir faninin görmediği kutsal emanet.
english: It is a sacred relic that no mortal has ever seen before.
Will you give him to my master?
Or we can force him.

text: İnsanlardan bir şeyler almak için elini uzatma.
english: Reach out to get something from the people.

text: Ancak onların suretinde verenin Allah-u Teala olduğunu bilirsen alabilirsin.
english: But if you know that the one who gives is Allah, you can receive.
Then, only knowledge...
Is this the fate he has set for you?
Open the door, Mr. Hey.
and trust.
If you want to learn...
I will tell you.
If you want to get rid of me...

text: Kalbim kılıcın kadar yakın sana evladım.
english: My heart is as close to you as your sword, my son.
Leave the old man alone.
Go on.
Take this man away.
I didn't sleep all night.
Go and rest.
I will stay with your son.
I'm coming from Ertugrul's side.
Thank God, he's fine.
Go and sleep.
There is news that he is a Kurd.
We will know how Gundogdu is.
I pray to God.
Everything we thought about for Kurdoglu...
I hope it will stay that way.
If God permits, my Bey.
If...
But the traitor inside us...
I will make him pay the most.
If not...

text: Kan kardeşim için düşündüğüm vesveseler için.
english: For my blood brother, for the nonsense I think.
I will go and ask for forgiveness.
I made a mistake against you.
Let me be your dervish.
I will sacrifice myself for you.
Go and help the guards.
Did he throw the ship, Gundogdu?

text: Benim attığı yemi tapınakçılara uçuracağımı düşünüyor.
english: He thinks I will be sent to the Templars for the food he gave me.
He'll see that I'm wrong.

text: Ondan sonra da emmisiyle birlikte obaya huzur gelecek Selçuk Hatun.
english: Then, Selcum Hatun will come to the tribe with her uncle.

text: Üzerimizde fazla şüphe var. Hayme hanım.
english: We have too many doubts about him. Hayme Hanım.
Do not worry.

text: O şüpheler de ortadan kalkacak. Nasıl?
english: Those doubts will be cleared. How?

text: Obaya Bahar geldi Selcan Hatun farkında değil misin?
english: Selcan Hatun, you know that it is spring time for the tribe, right?
May he smile a little.

text: Bırakma o anlattığı şeyi. Nasıl dedim?
english: Don't stop me. How?
...the traitor in the tribe will be revealed.
Then watch the sunset.

text: Nerede ortaya çıkacak? Ertuğrul'un cesedinin başında.
english: Where will it be revealed? At the head of Ertugrul's corpse.
You will take the rest when Tugrul dies.

text: Ne yapacaksın bu kadar altın Alpargu?
english: What are you going to do with so much gold, Alpargu?
...in the name of God.
You should know that.
Bye, bye, bye.
The girl of the tribe went on a trip.

text: Sultan Hatun kendine uygun görmez herhal bizleri.
english: Sultan Hatun doesn't see us as suitable for her.

text: Hem uygun görmez hem de ben bundan gayrı obanın kızıyım diye ortalığı bulandırır durur. Selcan Hatun.
english: ...and he is not satisfied with it. He is also trying to make everyone think that......he is the daughter of the tribe. Selcan Hatun.

text: Sözlerinizden biri bile aklımın ucundan geçmez.
english: Not a word of yours comes to my mind.
You have had a hard time.

text: Kalbinizi kırmaktan imtina ederim. Gören de seni iyilik meleği sanır.
english: I would rather break your heart than see you as a good angel.
If someone else's heart is so close to yours, think about what you did to my brother. What could I have done to your brother?

text: Ne kötü bir sözümü işitmiş ne de kendi bakışımı görmüştür.
english: He didn't hear my bad words or look at me in the eye.

text: Senin gibi saraydan çıkma havvarda kızları biliriz iyi kötü.
english: We know the girls of the palace like you.
We saw a lot of places.
They are like you.

text: Saraylardan çıkmadığınız belli oluyor Selcan Hatun.
english: It is obvious that you did not leave the palaces, Selcan Hatun.
I was talking about the first day you came.

text: Bu oba sana göre değil. Yerini yurdunu bil. Git, dediydim.
english: I told you to go to your hometown, not your tribe.
I was right.
We have suffered a lot because of you.
Now you're back.
You are hurting my brother.

text: Ben sevdiğim, beni seven adamın yanındayım Selcan Hatun.
english: I am with the man who loves me, Selcan Hatun.

text: Kardeşinize de bir şey yapmadım, yapmam da.
english: I did not harm your brother, and I will not.
What will he be like?
What happened to Suleyman Shah?

text: Gökçe ile evlenmesini vasiyet etti Ertuğrul'a.
english: ...to marry Gokce.

text: Dünya yıkılsa Ertuğrul Bey'in babasının sözünden çıkmaz.
english: If the world collapses, Ertugrul Bey's father's word will not be heard.
If you still haven't learned that, you are blind.

text: Ya niyetin kötü ya da gerçekten aklı kıt bir âşıksın.
english: Either you're bad-tempered or you're a really stupid lover.

text: Ben Ertuğrul Bey'in sevdiği kızım Selcan Hatun.
english: I am Ertugrul Bey's beloved daughter, Selcan Hatun.

text: Kaybolduğum her şeyi bırakıp geldim onun yanına.
english: I left everything I lost and came to him.

text: O git diyene kadar da bu ovanın kızıyım. O gel dediği için geldim. Git derse de giderim.
english: I am the daughter of this tribe until she leaves. I came because she said come. I will leave if she says go.
But this is his promise.

text: Sizin demenizi ya da Süleyman Şah'ın demesiyle değil.
english: Not by you saying it or Suleyman Shah saying it.

text: Bunu da böyle bilesiniz Selcan Hatun.
english: You should know that, Selcan Hatun.
It's obvious that until you're fired...

text: Ya da Ertuğrul belasını bulana kadar...
english: or until we find Ertugrul's trouble...
We will not be able to get rid of you.

text: O da yakında belasını bulacak Sertan.
english: He will soon find his trouble.
God bless you, son.
Thank you, father.
I hope he is alive.
If he is successful,
...and the Beydom will be opened.

text: Senin gibi bir babaya yakışan bir evlat olduğunu herkese gösterdim.
english: ...showed everyone that he was a son who would suit a father like you.
What do you want from him, Kurdoglu?

text: Obanın geleceğini onun ellerinde görüyorum Süleyman.
english: I see the tribe's future in his hands, Suleyman.
I saw that you were in the wrong.
I will support my nephew.

text: Doğrusunu eğrisini ölçüp bitsin diye gözlerini açarım onun.
english: I will open his eyes so that he can measure the truth and the falsehood.

text: Sen ne dersin Kurdoğlu? Bende yalan yoktur beyim, beni tanısın.
english: What do you say, Kurdoglu? I have no lies, sir. Let him know me.
I'm not drunk.
You made the wrong choices.
When will you know?

text: Hatta Halep'e Ertugrul'u elçi olarak gönderdi.
english: ...and sent Ertugrul to Aleppo as an ambassador.
That day is today.
I'm not dead yet, Kurdoglu.

text: Obanın geleceği senin ömrünle kaim değil.
english: The future of the tribe depends on you.

text: Kendim için bir şey istiyorsam namertim.
english: I'm not in the mood for anything for myself.

text: Uğruna hatunumla evlatlarımı verdiğim bu obayı...
english: I will give this tribe that I gave my wife and children for you...

text: Avrat peşinde koşan bir her gelenin ellerine bırakmayacak kadar sağ bir yoluyum elhamdülillah.
english: I am so lucky that I cannot leave a man who is after a woman.
That is all.
Are your valets ready?

text: Parada beni bekliyorlar. Güzel. O iş bitince, Yehuda ile birlikte......Ertugrul'un peşine düşmenizi istiyorum.
english: They are waiting for me in the money. Good. When that job is done, I want you to follow Ertugrul with Yehuda.
Finish your job when you are the weakest.

text: Tapınakçılar konsülü toplanmadan bu meselenin hallolmasını istiyor.
english: The Templars want this matter to be resolved before the council is gathered.
As you command, sir.

text: ...gezinti için teşekkür ederim amcacığım. Güzel doğur.
english: Thank you for the invitation, sir. You're welcome.
I have prepared a windmill for you.
He is a smart and intelligent animal.
Thank you, uncle.
Have fun, Isadora.

text: ...senin geleceğini düşünen senin gibi adamlar oldukça...
english: As long as there are men like you who think about their future,

text: Çok şükür sırtımız yere gelmez Kurdoğlu. Eyvallah Kutlu.
english: Thank God, Kurdoglu. Thank you, Akut.
What do you think?
You say good, you say good, sir.

text: Benim yaşım kadar cenk etmişliğin, bir o kadar obaya hizmetin vardır.
english: You have fought as hard as I have and served the tribe.

text: ...senin ağzından çıkan her söze itimat edilir.
english: I will obey every word you say.
...with respect.
I'm not going to let you go.
You must have met before.

text: Mesele Süleyman Şah ise iki kere durup düşünmek gerek. Bunu en iyi bilen sensin Kurduoğlu.
english: As for Suleyman Shah, we need to think twice. You know this best, Kurdoglu.

text: Sabahlara kadar cırcır böcekleri gibi istişare etmişsiniz. Peki nereye vardınız?
english: You have been in a hurry since morning. Where have you been?

text: Gündoğdu'nun bey olmasını istersin de neden kendin bey olmak istemezsin?
english: Why don't you want to be the Bey of Gundogdu?

text: Benim makamda, akçada gözüm yoktur Kutlu bilirsin. Olsa en zor zamanlarda bu işi pişirir...
english: You know I am not good at writing in Akça, Kutlu. If I were, I would do it in the most difficult times...
I gathered the council.
Why is Tekin Gundogdu?
What do you have to say?

text: Sürü satışından gelen akçalar keselerinizi doldurduğunda neden Gündoğdu dediğimi anlayacaksınız.
english: You will understand why I say Gundogdu when the farmers......who came from the herd of cattle fill your fields.
Not just you.

text: Ertuğrul ile babası yüzünden evlatlarını, kocalarını, sürülerini yitiren ahaliyi de anlayacak mısın?
english: ...will you understand the people who have lost their sons, husbands and their families......because of Ertugrul and his father?
The dead will stay with the dead.
Those who suffer know.

text: Obamız taze duydan, oğulsuz anadan geçilmez.
english: Our tribe will never be separated from its mother.

text: Otağın önünde kendine de, sersem ahaliye de...
english: In front of the tent, in front of you and the people...

text: Yok fütühat, yok cenk diye dolduruşa getiren bir bey mi istersiniz?
english: Do you want a Bey who brings about war?

text: Obasını ihya eden, işini iyi bilen bir beyim.
english: A Bey who knows his job and who is the one who makes his tribe prosper.
...and the swords are strong?
Otherwise, he will be out of his mind...

text: Acı üstüne acı, kan üstüne kan kusmasın.
english: Pain over pain, blood over blood.
And now...

text: Artık hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacak Hayme.
english: Nothing will be the same as before, Hayme.
Kurdoglu opened my eyes.
He woke me up.
What do you think, my Bey?
even if he is a human child,
When it's time for the Beydom...

text: Kibir putları bir bir çıkarmış ortaya.
english: He has revealed his tricks.
...in the Oghuz Dastans...

text: Bildiğimiz gibi her şey etrafımızda olur da.
english: As we know, everything happens around us.
We were not aware of it.

text: Ama şimdi her şeyi daha iyi görüyorum.
english: But now I see everything better.
What are you looking at?
The father of the father.

text: Kibir putları birer birer ortaya çıkınca...
english: When the idols of arrogance emerge one by one...
and the storm in the tent.
Maybe the best thing is...
the waters were still.
to withdraw from the Beydom.

text: Şam Melikesi ile Sultan Alaaddin'in evliliği çok mühim Gündoğdu.
english: The marriage of Sultan Aladdin and the Queen of Damascus is very important, Gundogdu.

text: Sultan Alaaddin, Haçlılara ve Moğollara karşı...
english: Sultan Aladdin was very angry

text: Eyüp'ü Selçuklu İttifakı'nın güçlenmesi adına bu evlilikten doğacak çocuğunu veliaht olarak ilan edeceğini taahhüt etti.
english: ...to announce that he will give birth to his child as a heir......in order to strengthen the Ayyubid-Selçuk alliance.
I saw the ninth gift of Sultan Aladdin.

text: Dokuz atı, dokuz hilatı, dokuz köleği.
english: Nine horses, nine herds, nine slaves.

text: Kim bilir içinde daha neler vardır.
english: Who knows what else is in there?
This would suit Seljuk people.

text: Zor ama yerinde bir karar Ersogun Bey.
english: It's a difficult but good decision, Ersogun Bey.

text: Şimdi daha iyi anlıyorum Şam'a gidecek kervanı neden saklı tutmak istediğinizi. Lakin o kefereler bunu öğrenecek olursa buna engel olmak için her şeyi yapacaklardır.
english: Now I understand why you want to keep the caravan to Damascus hidden. But if the infidels learn about this, they will do anything to prevent it.
God bless you, brother.
What about Kurdoglu?
I trust my uncle completely.

text: Lakin babamın ve Ertuğrul'un içine şüphe bir kere düştü.
english: But my father and Ertugrul have a doubt.

text: Süleyman Şah otağdan onu gönderip benimle baş başa konuşmak isteyince...
english: When Suleyman Shah sent him from the tent and wanted to talk to me in person,
I understand that it is a matter.

text: Yalnız şunu iyi bil Gündoğdu. Kurdoğlu'yla cenk etmişliğim vardır. Bugüne kadar gördüğüm en iyi savaşçılardan biridir, yiğittir. Üstelik bunca zaman babana hizmet etmişliği de vardır.
english: But know this, Gundogdu. I fought with Kurdoglu. He is one of the best warriors I have ever seen. He is a brave man. And he has served your father all this time.

text: ...emmin kurduğun tezgahtan alna açık bir şekilde çıkmayı başaracaktır. Eyvallah Ersugun Bey.
english: your uncle will be able to get out of the trap you set up. Thank you, Ersugun Bey.

text: Ne zaman arzu ederseniz yola düşeriz. Biz hazırız Gündoğdu. Lakin...
english: We will be on our way whenever you want. We are ready, Gundogdu. However...
Let's eat a few bites first.
Mario, we have to go.
Thank you. Let's eat together.

text: Tapınakçıların kalesinden geliyorum. Adım İzadora Manzi'nin.
english: I'm coming from the Templars' Castle. His name is Isadora Manzi.
I am Ustad-i Azam Petrus Rahman Zeynep's niece.
I have news from Turgut Alp.
So he escaped.
Where is my nephew running to? Why is he running?

text: Bağlı olan atını çözüp bize haber vermeden kaçmış efendim.
english: He escaped without telling us about the horse.
Damn it!
No one is coming or going.
We have to leave before the day is over.
We have a long way to go.
Let's go.
Inform the Alps right away. Get ready.
We can't make Gundogdu wait.

text: Demek ki Kurdoğlu hain değilmiş ha?
english: So, Kurdoglu is not a traitor.
I'll be back in a month.
We've taken the man-machine's sin. What did you say?
Get ready. Let's go.

text: Bizim senin hakkındaki her şeyi biliyor Petruchio.
english: Our daughter knows everything about you, Petruchio.
What kind of a murderer are you?
What kind of a devil are you?
I know everything about you.
how he learned to live.
You will never learn this.
I have learned the secret of Ibn Arabi.

text: Artık sana ihtiyacım yok. O sırra vakıf olabilmek için...
english: I don't need you anymore. In order to be able to understand that secret...
First, you need to be human.
Son of a...
I don't need your daughter either.

text: Kızım, zafer kazanmana engel olacak Betruca.
english: My daughter will not win, Petrucci.
We'll spend the night here.
After taking the necessary precautions,
They may retreat. Yes, sir.

text: Atları da şu aşağıdaki dereye götürün.
english: Take the horses to the stream down there.

text: Sultanın hediyesi dokuzlu atları diğerlerinden uzak tutun. Emredersiniz beyim.
english: Keep the nine horses away from the others. Yes, sir.
Our blood is not in the ground, Titus.
I'm gonna come out.
If only one of our tribe's people survived.
I don't have peace.
